definition: knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: This special blade on his knife is for picking stones out of horses' feet.
sentences.chinese: 他刀上有一特制刀刃，是用来剔去马蹄上的石头的。

sentences.english: Bucket cutting edges of abrasive-resistant steel of up to 500 Brinell.
sentences.chinese: 铲斗切削刀刃为抗磨料磨损钢材，布氏硬度达500。

sentences.english: The blade and chalice guarding o'er Her gates.
sentences.chinese: 刀刃与圣杯守护伊门宅。

sentences.english: A sharp blade is likely to nick the skin and draw blood.
sentences.chinese: 锋利的刀刃可能会划伤皮肤，导致出血。

sentences.english: Haldon's smile was as sharp as the blade of a dagger.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔顿的笑容锋利的如同匕首的刀刃。

sentences.english: Dicing a blade to a comb.
sentences.chinese: 把一把刀的刀刃切割成梳子状。

sentences.english: He had been found with a broken knife blade in his chest.
sentences.chinese: 他被发现时胸口插着一把缺刃的刀刃。

sentences.english: I took it from his hand, and touched the blade.
sentences.chinese: 我从他手里拿过来，摸摸刀刃。

sentences.english: The knife blade angle is small, when cutting labor.
sentences.chinese: 现有菜刀的刀刃角度较小，切菜时省力。

sentences.english: Manufacturer of quality cutting edges and wear parts for all makes of earthmoving equipment.
sentences.chinese: 为各种运土搬运设备制造优质切割刀刃和耐用部件。

sentences.english: Workers and managers didn't live quite so much on the knife-edge of the market.
sentences.chinese: 当时的工人和管理层并不都是在市场的刀刃上讨生活。

sentences.english: But hatred is a curved blade.
sentences.chinese: 但是，仇恨是一个弯弯的刀刃。

sentences.english: This is an example of a smaller version of the larger "spear point" blade.
sentences.chinese: 笔形刀刃是大型矛尖刀刃的缩小版本的一个例子。

sentences.english: This is an example of a smaller version of the larger "spear point" blade.
sentences.chinese: 笔形刀刃是大型矛尖刀刃的缩小版本的一个例子。

sentences.english: Tarnished blades are cleaned easily with steel wool and scouring powder.
sentences.chinese: 用钢丝球和去污粉可以很容易地清洗掉刀刃上的铁锈。

definition: cutting edge or point of a knife, sword or tool
